block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold this easy Origami Cat designed by Steve Biddle. It is the perfect familiar cat companion for your origami witch or wizard. It is also the perfect origami decoration for Halloween. Mini Cats Everywhere!!! Try it out, I hope you like it. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Steve Biddle
block_list.body:

  • Santa Claus by Steve And Megumi Biddle
